item.title: About
item.description: This is a new blog by Larry Vincent that is dedicated to data science, marketing research and consumer psychology. It is a perfect companion to The Findings Report, a blog and a podcast that explores why people buy, like and share. Opinions expressed here are by the author and do not represent the views of UTA or the University of Southern California.

item.title: Brands and the attachment gap
item.description: Following are the actual attachment scores from the study, based on stated connection to the brand. html { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', Arial, sans-serif; } #jszbhsogaj .gt_table { display: table; border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; color: #000000; font-size: 16px; background-color: #FFFFFF; /* table.background.color */ width: auto; /* table.width */ border-top-style: solid; /* table.border.top.style */ border-top-width: 2px; /* table.
